Childcare Survey Calendar and Module Key

Last Updated: 07/22/2021

Survey Calendar and Module Key

Survey Calendar

Baseline Survey = Survey that participants take when first participating

Follow-Up Survey = Participants are invited to a follow-up survey that contains some core items from baseline and additional module items

Module Key

Module Key

Below is a key that provides a brief summary of each module as well as a link to the questions for that module on the site. You can also use the navigation bar to switch between modules.
